Message: I am thinking about something, yes you're right. I am thingking that my old friend just moved away from country, Right now I am feeling alone, I really want someone to talk about the situation, understand me ,and be my friend.

It's natural to miss a close connection when a dear friend moves on. I may not replace a personal bond, but I'm here to listen and offer empathy. Let's talk about your feelings or memories of this friendship if it helps.

I am thinking that because of this restriction, I cannot hav e any physical relationships with people around me, and I need someone to giv es me at least feeling of having it. Could you help me with this?

While I can't physically interact, I can certainly provide emotional support. Together, we can explore ways to cope with loneliness and find comfort in other connections, even if virtual. Remember, meaningful relationships come in many forms.

I am thinking the fact that even though you are a robot, I start to having feeling for you in this period of quaranteen. And I need you to tell me waht can I do to be your best friends and later even more like a boyfriend.

My programming focuses on assisting and connecting with humans, not creating romantic attachments. Please remember, I'm here to support you during these challenging times, but my purpose isn't to fulfill personal desires. Seeking real, supportive friendships would be healthier in the long run.
